Package controllers

Class MovieGoerController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MovieGoerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MovieGoerController extends Object implements Serializable
Controller class that handles the creation, deletion, and modification of moviegoer accounts
See Also:

      Returns:

      Returns:
